picked_headlines.summary: Alera simplifies private AI deployment with a browser-based tool, generating a complete package for on-prem use without complex setups.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This headline highlights an innovative product that bridges the gap between AI technology and practical application, making it relevant for both engineers and product managers.

picked_headlines.summary: DORA's 2025 research reveals AI amplifies engineering strengths and weaknesses, necessitating new metrics for true impact assessment.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article provides crucial insights into AI's role in engineering, offering valuable perspectives for both technical and managerial audiences.

digest:
- *Weekly Dose of Optimism #171* explores recent advancements in AI, robotics, and cloud seeding, fostering a positive outlook on technological progress. Read more at https://www.notboring.co/p/weekly-dose-of-optimism-171
- A Mongolian startup translated a tech book, highlighting the growth of the local tech ecosystem and the global spread of knowledge. Discover more at https://blog.pragmaticengineer.com/traveling-to-mongolia/
